statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE contract_triggered = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS sensor_count FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING sensor_count > 50;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING contract_triggered = true;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM SensorData WHERE contract_triggered = false;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE action = 'Notify' AND trigger_condition LIKE '%temperature%' ORDER BY last_triggered DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE last_triggered IS NULL;
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name, data_type
SELECT contract_name, contract_address, trigger_condition FROM smart_contracts WHERE last_triggered IS NULL
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT contract_name, action, last_triggered FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY last_triggered DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_logs GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT s.sensor_type, sl.sensor_value, sc.contract_name FROM sensor_logs sl JOIN sensors s ON sl.sensor_id = s.sensor_id JOIN smart_contracts sc ON sl.triggered_contract = sc.contract_id;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM sensor_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, data_value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_type='TypeA';
SELECT contract_id, description FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_type='TypeB';
SELECT contract_id, contract_address FROM SmartContracts WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_type, contract_address FROM SmartContracts WHERE description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY contract_id ASC;
SELECT action_type, action_description, triggered_at FROM SensorActions WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND action_type = 'alert' ORDER BY triggered_at DESC;
SELECT log_message, logged_at FROM ContractLogs WHERE contract_id = 5 AND logged_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY logged_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_owner, contract_address FROM contracts WHERE contract_owner LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location_id FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT s.sensor_name, a.action_name, a.action_trigger FROM sensors s JOIN actions a ON s.sensor_id = a.action_id;
SELECT sd.sensor_id, sd.data_value, sd.data_timestamp, a.action_name FROM sensor_data sd JOIN actions a ON sd.sensor_id = a.contract_id;
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.sensor_name, sa.action_id FROM sensors s LEFT JOIN sensor_actions sa ON s.sensor_id = sa.sensor_id WHERE sa.action_id IS NULL;
